modShortDescription: Adds a Chicken Coop to generate eggs and feathers. Coop generates eggs (1-5) and feathers (1-5) every 2-3 in-game days. Placeable anywhere.
modDescription:
Adds a Chicken Coop to generate eggs and feathers.

* Adds a craftable Chicken Coop to the game.
* Coop generates eggs (1-5) and feathers (1-5) every 2-3 in-game days.
* Unlocked via the Living off the Land Perk (level 1)
* Placeable anywhere

**Important:** Needs to be installed on both the server and client sides, due to custom icon(s)/assets.

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/15XeieUcPuvF2RSFmzAqCDlkNpZLESamo/view?usp=sharing)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/20806-freakuks-modlets/).

**Credits:** [FreakUK](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/freakuk/)
